text: Hey,  All i'm searching one API regarding how to get company by domain name in HubSpot please help me for this.

can we get owner details like name in the workflow custom code action ?
HubSpotClient.crm.owner

Hey, <@U02CUFSCXHQ> i'm searching API from the company crm, how can i find company by domain, so basically i need one get API for it.

i used this :
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/companies/search_companies_by_domain>
but this is also not helpful, please help me for it.

Hi <@U03JBBLT39P>
You’ll need to pass the property name in the url something like this

`{{url}}?properties=custom_filed_name`

You can use this api to find data based on any property.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
G'day folks. I'm trying to retrieve, via the API a breakdown of email stats by send date and time, especially for automated emails. Is this possible?

Good day,

Is there a way to query all marketing campaigns, not only the email ones?

Hey, Hope you all doing good.

I ran into some weird bug. I’m getting “HTTP Request Failed” error when using API,
```const { response } = await client.crm.contacts.basicApi.getPage(1, '0', properties);```
This error occurs only for some HubSpot accounts. Any hunches on this?
I’m using Node 16.4.2 and @HubSpot/api-client: 5.0.0 version

Also, I suspect it fails only with <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs|this> library not with REST API
these give stats and it gives published date time
I'm looking for send dates and send times
<@U0384410QTG>, can you help us find who might be the right person to assist on this one?
